title: Mixed Learning (VRL+HOL)-Based Scientific Inquiry Education for Anomaly Data Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical concepts, data visualization methods, and laboratory safety protocols
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment combining smartphone-based virtual labs (VRL) and hands-on experiments (HOL). Comprehensive verification of anomalous data interpretation skills through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Compare structured data generated in virtual experiments (VRL) with anomalous data collected in actual experiments (HOL) to explain variability.
Identify five or more types of anomalous data (e.g., outliers, measurement errors) and scientifically infer their causes.
Through team-based projects, visualize anomalous data analysis results and propose improvements to experimental design.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
